Refresher

Non-Trivial Information

Refresher is a project that aspires to bring enthusiasm and fun to learning by "gamifying" core subjects. The approach is to take small, bite-sized lessons on non-trivial subject matters and present them in a trivia-like format. But the goal isn't just to reach students, it's to encourage everyone to continue - and be excited by - learning.

Refresher is about:

  • Making learning fun. Learning shouldn't be a chore, it should be an adventure! Inspired by education technology companies such as Khan Academy and Duolingo, Refresher aims to use core curriculum to be a fierce competitor of Candy Crush.
  • Freedom of knowledge. Taking cues from the Open Source, Creative Commons, and Crowdsourced communities, Refreshers strives to be accessible to all. The casual user shouldn't need a credit card to learn.

Refresher is really, really new and still very much in development. For more information on the Beta release, follow Refresher online.
